mapper.select: /* Mapper - login */ SELECT MID ,MPW ,MNAME ,MGRADE ,MEMAIL FROM TUMEM WHERE MID=#{mid} AND MPW=#{mpw} AND MDELETEYN='Y'
/* Mapper - emailCheck */ SELECT MEMAIL FROM TUMEM WHERE MEMAIL=#{memail} AND MDELETEYN='Y'
/* Mapper - searchID */ SELECT MID FROM TUMEM WHERE MEMAIL=#{memail} AND MDELETEYN='Y'
mapper.update: /* Mapper - memberDelete */ UPDATE TUMEM SET MDELETEYN='N', MDELETEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE MID=#{mid} AND MDELETEYN='Y'
/* Mapper - changePW */ UPDATE TUMEM SET MPW=#{number} , MUPDATEDATE=SYSDATE WHERE MID=#{mid} AND MDELETEYN='Y'
